import React from 'react' import '../signup/signup.css' import { userLoginSchema } from '../../validation/formValidation' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' function Login() { const {register,handleSubmit,formState:{errors}}=useForm({ resolver:yupResolver(userLoginSchema) }) const loginSubmit=(data)=>{ console.log(data); } return (
